column2: Roughly, what is the proportion of time you spend on watching short video (TikTok, Red Note, Reels, Youtube Shorts) vs long video (Bilibili, Youtube) each week?
column3: Do you have a preferred video format?
column4: What is the most likely reason you stop watching a video?
column5: What attributes or elements of a long video make it more engaging?
column6: Do you experience any decline of attention span in your daily life?
column7: If so, where do you experience it?
column8: Would you blame the decline of attention span to watching short videos?
column9: Do you actively search for content or rely on recommendations?
column10: Which of the following is the most likely reason you would share a video with your friends?
column11: Did you lose focus while completing this survey? Please be honest with us!
